English.Text: You comport yourself with dignity, "Your Majesty, please, I'm not here to seize you, but to assist you in any way I am able!" The short rotund figure turns, dresses in hand, and a small but shrill voice floats back towards you over the sound of the sea. "Meet me at the Cape of Trelawney!" You find your own ship at the marina, and sail to Trelawney, southernmost point of the Old World. It was not fifteen years previous, that a great naval victory was won here over La Corona by one Admiral Nadasky. The Lap of Victory is there waiting for you, and the Queen receives you warmly aboard. You are finally able to ask her why it is she has run away.
